hackathon-description-text: The mix of bioengineering, coding skills and domain-specific medical knowledge is why you should be excited about this event. You will also get to meet all the amazing researchers and developers who will be there to provide each team with genuine support and ideas because you will work on the causes they care about.
hackathon-rules:
All attendees, sponsors, partners, volunteers and staff at our hackathon are required to agree with the code of conduct.
https://hackcodeofconduct.org/420-ic_healthhack

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Personal mentorship and promotion of the winning project.

hackathon-description-header: HealthHack brings our community together to work on ideas which require interdisciplinary excellence. We are focused on serious games in the health sector taking advantage of biomedical technologies.
